import React, { useState } from 'react' import { IonContent, IonHeader, IonList, IonPage, IonRefresher, IonRefresherContent, IonTitle, IonToolbar, useIonViewWillEnter, IonButtons, IonThumbnail, IonImg, IonLabel, IonButton, IonIcon, IonPopover, IonItem } from '@ionic/react' import '../styles/AllartSelectStyle.css' import ProductImagesItem from '../components/ProductImagesItem' import { Images, getProductImages } from '../data/ProductImages' import { RouteComponentProps } from 'react-router-dom' // import ProductSlider from '../components/ProductSlider' interface ProductGalleryProps extends RouteComponentProps<{ imagesListID: string }> {} const ProductGallery: React.FC = ({ match }) => { const [ProductImages, setProductImages] = useState([]) const [showPopover, setShowPopover] = useState(false) const filteredImages = ProductImages.filter((pi) => pi.pageName === match.params.imagesListID) const numImages = filteredImages.length const imagesListID = match.params.imagesListID useIonViewWillEnter(() => { const pimg = getProductImages() setProductImages(pimg) }) const refresh = (e: CustomEvent) => { setTimeout(() => e.detail.complete(), 3000) } const handleOpenSlider = () => { console.log('handleOpenSlider') } return ( {imagesListID} setShowPopover(true)}> setShowPopover(false)} > Notifications
Search {/*
Rate Now
Share Now*/}

{imagesListID}

{numImages} Photos

 {filteredImages.map(pi => ( ))} {/* */} ) } export default ProductGallery
